data.name: Blast Brigade vs. the Evil Legion of Dr. Cread Demo
data.detailed_description:
The evil genius Dr. Cread plans to conquer the world with his robot army, and this team of hot-headed superspies is the only thing that can stop him. Welcome to the demo for Blast Brigade vs. the Evil Legion of Dr. Cread. You will play through the intro section of the game to get familiar with the movement and shooting. Once you've prove that you are on top of things, you will get to experience an area in a more advanced section of the game, where you can really put your skills to the test against the icy cold and a challenging boss!


Prevent doomsday in Blast Brigade! This colorful 2D action-adventure game is inspired by '80s popcorn action movies and combines metroidvania exploration with the bullet mayhem of platformer gameplay. Build a team of charismatic playable characters, upgrade your weapons, explore beautiful locations around a tainted paradise, and save the world from the mad scientist!



Assemble a team of four superspies and switch between them on the fly to utilize their unique abilities and progress through the game. Their outstanding personalities just add to the charm... and the dangers they attract.



Prepare for a wide variety of boss fights that will tempt and test you! Encounter hybrid monstrosities, giant robots, and plenty of other evil minions - all created for the sole purpose of your imminent demise, according to the expert opinion of Dr. Cread.



Make good use of your abilities to be the best like no one ever was... or die trying. A grenade launcher, a grappling hook, a сhakram-teleporter and more tools will be at your disposal. Bring along not just fists but also your wits - and you just might make it!



Discover a charming paradise island swarmed by the devious experiments of the crooked scientist. No one said you can't enjoy sunbathing and picturesque scenes while fending off hordes of enemies!



Uncover the conspiracy of Dr. Cread and his wicked plans to enslave and robotize the world. Gather your brigade, combine their skills and bring the villain to justice. Or miserably fail and become robot food. Wait, do robots even eat?
